page.title: 16CHARLESTON PADDOCKS
page.content: CHALESTON PADDOCKS IS SITUATED BY BIGNALS CORNER.IT HAS 325 BLOCK KENNELS.THE AREA OF EACH KENNEL IS 8*6 FEET.THE BIG KENNELS HOLD 160 DOGS .THERE ARE 5 ISOLATION KENNELS WHICH HAVE HEATERS BUILT INTO THE ROOF.CHALESTON PADDOCKS HAS SMALL SETS OF KENNELS WHICH HOLD 160 SMALL DOGS.THE CATERYS ARE NOT AS BIG AS THE KENNELS.THE AREA OF EACH CAGE IS 6*6 FEET.THE CATERYS ARE ALSO HEATED IN THE WINTER.THERE IS A STOREROOM WHICH HOLDS 60,000 POUNDS WORTH OF DOG AND CAT FOOD ABOUT 45000 CANS.THE DRAINS ARE REGULARY GIVEN A CLEAN TO KILL THE GERMS.THE FIRST AID BUILDING,ALSO HEATED,HAS ENOUGH SPACE FOR 6 CATS AND 6 DOGS.THERE IS A BIG GENORATOR ROOM WHICH IS USED IN AN EMERGENCY TO GIVE ELECTRICITY TO THE HEATERS AND THE LIGHTS IN THE KENNELS.THERE IS A FIRE POINT BY THE GENORATOR ROOM.
